long_description: Boasting 3-finger bar ends, broad palm platforms and antislip grip inserts, the Ergon GP3 Bike Grips are designed to enhance hand support during commutes and tours. 3-finger bar ends increase hand position options and offer leverage for out-of-the-saddle cranking. Palm platform and bar end are independently adjustable to optimize support. The Ergon GP3 Bike Grips feature integrated antislip rubber inserts for excellent grip in all conditions. Note: These grips are not suitable for use with carbon handlebars.
short_description: Boasting 3-finger bar ends, broad palm platforms and antislip grip inserts, the Ergon GP3 Bike Grips are designed to enhance hand support during commutes and tours.
